data.title: Phoenix School Of Law
data.meta_description: Arizona Summit Law School offers numerous institutional scholarships for students. Awards may be merit-based, academic or athletic.
data.text:
The Phoenix School of Law (also referred to as PhoenixLaw) is a private, for-profit law school located in Phoenix, Arizona. Founded in 2005 and accredited by the American Bar Association in 2010, PhoenixLaw is the only private law school in Arizona. The school is not affiliated with the similarly named University of Phoenix. Phoenix is part of the InfiLaw System of independent law schools, which includes Florida Coastal School of Law and Charlotte School of Law, owned by Sterling Partners.

* Description and images provided by Wikipedia under CC-BY-SA 3.0 license .
